events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering for the Software Engineer role based on your resume details.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out soon to discuss the next steps in our hiring process.
We completed an initial screening interview to evaluate your software development skills and overall fit for the engineering team.
Thank you for your prompt response and engaging discussion during the initial screening interview today.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM to assess your coding and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview was successfully completed and we were impressed with your expertise in software engineering.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss compensation, company culture, and benefits in more detail.
You completed the HR interview where we further explored your career goals and how they align with our engineering team.
We are excited to propose an official job offer for the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary package.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted our job offer and we are thrilled to welcome you to our engineering department.
The onboarding process has begun to help you get acclimated with our engineering team and access necessary development resources.
Your hiring process is now officially closed with a successful start to your new role in our software engineering team.
